alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Misty Fjords; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 4:30AM AKST until January 26 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of the south-central and southern Inner Channels including Ketchikan, Petersburg, Wrangell, Thorne Bay, Kake, Metlakatla, Coffman Cove, Port Protection, Point Baker, Kasaan, and Saxman. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Aviation and marine transportation will also be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will likely thin through the day.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Misty Fjords; Southern Inner Channels
